website_summaries.verdict: An inner spring mattress made with longevity in mind. It features a waterproof cover, and its edges are reinforced for extra toddler support.
pros: Extra perimeter support so toddlers are steady no matter where they sit
cons: Some users noticed indentations in the mattress after only weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and can withstand the abuse of toddlers and little children
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Sealy Crib Mattress I've purchased. I really like their sturdy construction and can really stand up to the abuse toddlers and little children can give them. The only negative that I've seen in the 5 years of owning them is that the plastic liner can dry out and crack with time. It typically happens on the corners of the mattress but it doesn't always happen to on every corner. Even so, I would still buy another one if needed. They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jim White

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but starting to sag
customer_reviews.text: Ok mattress for Baby. However, after 2 months of use for my newborn, you can tell where she sleeps. There is a very slight sag in the middle of the mattress. I went with an inner spring mattress instead of memory foam in hopes that this wouldn't happen, but it did. Hopefully it will get her through a few years without much discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: kittykatkove

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE FOR INFANTS
customer_reviews.text: Infant mattresses should be very firm to prevent from suffocation. I am a pediatric sleep consultant, mom of two and well informed regarding sleep. It doesn’t take a genius to see that this mattress is unsafe. I realized after placing my son down in his crib for a few naps that his head and torso sunk in quite a bit. If he were to roll on his stomach, as all babies do, this would be a huge suffocation hazard. He is not rolling yet but I am tossing this and ordering a new one ASAP. Back to the bassinet for naps, he goes!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I don’t love it but the baby seems to
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price this is an ok mattress. For our first we went with a different mattress that doesn’t have springs and i like that much better ( although it was twice the money.) it works if you are on a budget but I think it’s worth buying the nicer one. We will see how it holds up over time. The baby sleeps great in it though and I guess that’s what matters
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Scott

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. An indention appeared on the mattress a few weeks after putting my one month old on it....and I never put her in the same spot. It's lightweight which is nice. I don't know how long it will last. But...my daughter doesn't seem to mind and sleeps through the night so I guess that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P.

customer_reviews.title: We thought this mattress looked nice, and had good reviews that is why we ...
customer_reviews.text: Mattress arrived with one seam already coming apart. We thought this mattress looked nice, and had good reviews that is why we ordered it for my daughter. She is almost 3 now and i feel like she doesnt sleep as well on this mattress as she does on the one at my parent's house. Im not sure which one they bought, but there's seems more comfortable, and doesnt have the crackly plastic feel that this one does. I wouldn't recommend this if you are looking for something that you want to last very long. I have noticed that another seem has separated recently as well
customer_reviews.author: Sara Grasska

customer_reviews.title: Great crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: This crib mattress has the quality that you would expect from Sealy. It fit perfectly in our son's crib and has a nice soft but firm construction. He started sleeping though the night even quicker than his older sister and I think that the mattress may have something to do with that.
customer_reviews.author: Lance A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is too soft for newborn. Not a good buy if you have an infant. I lost the box that came with it so I'm just hoping when my son gets older, it would be a better fit. Stay away if you are expecting. Don't make the mistake I did
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money for a mattress that will last longer.
customer_reviews.text: Too firm.. You get what you pay for. I went with this mattress because of the high reviews and the cheap price but ignored the bad reviews about the indentations. My baby has been in her crib since she was a newborn and we set her in the middle of the crib to sleep. I noticed the indentation after 3 weeks. It didn't bother me at the time but now she's 5 months old and has been rolling over and waking on her belly. She wakes up crying because she can't get comfortable and it's probably not safe because the indentation is so bad now. Spend the extra money for a mattress that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: TKE

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to unpack and my two year old looks super comfortable when he sleeps on it!
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Fits in crib fine
customer_reviews.text: I rated it 2 stars for softness because it is an infant mattress, so it is intended not to be soft. We are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Find something better
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to clean but already has an indention. My baby is just 5 months old and been sleeping on this mattress for a couple months for naps only. Jut recently transitioned to all night sleeping (about a week now) and you can tell exactly where she sleeps because there’s an indention in the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Shanaberger

customer_reviews.title: The one pictured looks like you can wipe clean and dry and made from ...
customer_reviews.text: The mattress i received is not at all the one pictured. It is cloth and white with pattern. The one pictured looks like you can wipe clean and dry and made from a plastic material. This is cloth and nothing like that!! Nothing like the one pictured it looks cheap like from walmart.
customer_reviews.author: carmen rice

customer_reviews.title: She sleeps!
customer_reviews.text: Since it is for my newborn and she can’t talk I am unable to say what the comfort level is.... I do know though that she doesn’t hate it and sleeps great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fine mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good baby mattress, firm + waterproof material. Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Holly R

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner in excellent condition. Exactly what I expected to receive. This isn't the top of the line crib mattress sealy makes, but it is very good and comfortable. They make one level higher but it's nearly three times as heavy as this one to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why so many reviews call this thing too soft. It isn't. It also isn't too hard. It is "just right." My 6 month old loves it. She sleeps better in her crib than she ever did in her bassinet and she has a lot of fun rolling around on it. I trust this brand to last through her toddler years, until she's ready for the handy-dandy super-fancy twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! It’s the perfect firmness and fit in our crib so well. The waterproof feature is by far my favorite thing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: 2 items arrived both damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress arrived damaged so we returned it for a new one. The second one arrived more damaged than the first one. It looks like the boxes were run through with a forklift.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur G Caesar

customer_reviews.title: good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mattress! I was hesitant on buying a mattress online but went with this one based on other reviews. I feel like the firmness is perfect for a baby and toddler! The corners of the mattress aren't too squishy, but are good and strong! I'm really hot with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SourthernLady2011

customer_reviews.title: much better than baby mattresses I've bought in the past
customer_reviews.text: Actually quite cozy and firm.... much better than baby mattresses I've bought in the past. Not too loud or crinkly sounding with the mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice crib mattress. We purchased this to go into the crib at our house for our Granddaughter. It is firm and comfortable, and the Burt's Bees sheet fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old grand-daughter. She loves it. Fits the toddler bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: We like this mattress so far and is good for the ...
customer_reviews.text: We like this mattress so far and is good for the money. However, it does not feel as sturdy as the Colgate 2-in-1.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Ryan

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and made of good quality. Can't wait for my little girl to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My baby slept good thought it wasn’t plastic but it is but my baby slept good
customer_reviews.author: darshima  roberson

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress! Not too soft
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! Not too soft, not too firm && the perfect thickness. I think baby will be comfy :)
customer_reviews.author: Jayna Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: After only a month of use by infant, there is a divot in the mattress. The mattress seems firm but an 11 lb baby shouldn't leave an impression. We are returning this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps like a baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Not top of the line, but much better quality than some I viewed. She sleeps like a baby *pun intended*
customer_reviews.author: danielle dershem

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent mattress
customer_reviews.text: There isn't too much to say except - this fit my crib perfectly. It's a very firm mattress which is good for babies. It's already got a waterproofing outer layer so it should make for easy cleanups. Once my baby transitions from my cosleeper to her crib - this will be used more.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Chica

customer_reviews.title: So far no complaints
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints. My infant sleeps longer on it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not Firm Enough
customer_reviews.text: Our almost-4-month old, 12 pound baby left indents on this mattress the first day. It's not firm enough, in my opinion; will be sending it right back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: enl

customer_reviews.title: I have no issues with this mattress. My daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with this mattress. My daughter isn't a very picky baby, but she sleeps very well on it. Just the right amount of firmness. Not extremely firm and not too soft. And it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: maribell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice but slightly over priced I can tell my crib will out last the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the crib nice and snug and is nice and firm. High quality feel. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not a great sleep
customer_reviews.text: Makes horrible sounds from what outside of mattress is made of.. not comfortable. My toddler is very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Holly Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer/ happy baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves to sleep on it! We are satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: At the crib like I expected. Nice snug fit. Mattress seems thick and comfortable and is firm. Very happy with value and product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress for the price! In came in with a print on it not a solid color and ours came in with no pockets on the sides for air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not firm enough
customer_reviews.text: My son is only 3.5 months and the mattress is already sloped/dented and I've flipped the mattress twice. The mattress really didn't hold up or keep its firmness long at all, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was recommended in the Baby Bargains book and we love it. It fits perfect in our baby bed and for the short time that it is going to be used the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: very nice balance of soft but firm
customer_reviews.text: fits well in the crib we got, very nice balance of soft but firm, i like the wipe clean feature- it means all you need is a sheet and you're set to go!
customer_reviews.author: Libby S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right amount of firmness coupled with the softness a baby would need.The fit inside the crib is snug though not as tight as I imagined. Baby is not here yet, so I can't comment on how it will hold up with regular use. I got the sealy waterproof mattress cover too. Only concern is that the height of the mattress is on the shorter side. I would have to bend just a bit more to pick up my baby. Packing and delivery were good. Right up to my 2nd floor apartment door. It's also not priced $120 or something, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mishmommy

customer_reviews.title: It's inexpensive for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my less than seven pounds infant shouldn't be able to make a dent in a mattress yet somehow there is already a dent where he sleeps at night. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Good product and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great and fits our crib just fine - not too firm not too soft. Although the mattress is waterproof, I use a mattress pad under the sheet just for added softness/padding. I wanted a mattress made in the USA so that was a big plus for me. Baby seems to love it he sleeps like a rock, in fact it is 8:00am and he is still sleeping (he is 11 months).
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these mattresses for our twin boys' cribs four years ago. They are firm mattresses and my almost four year old boys still use them in their beds. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Okerlund

customer_reviews.title: For my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item for the price. My son loved this mattress for his new baby-not too hard...not too soft. Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Tyraray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very cost efficient, and wipes down easily
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for 2 1/2 years now for my daughter's crib and it serves it's purpose. It is of good quality, very cost efficient, and wipes down easily during cleaning. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelskky

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase this item based on other reviews stating it was not firm enough. Unfortunately, they were right. My son, who is now 12 1/2 pounds at 4 months, leaves indentations in this mattress and we just started putting him in it (was in a bassinette until now). I am now already looking for a replacement as I am afraid to leave him in it at night. I would not recommend this mattress as it is too soft.
customer_reviews.author: melnel

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: We are expecting our 8th child this week. This mattress meets all of consumer reports safety standards. It isn't too hard or soft from our experience and appears to be a good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves her new bed
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit on the Dream On Me bed. Firm, comfortable, with a little bounce. Well worth the price. I would buy this mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: Chappyiam

customer_reviews.title: Firm and so far is working great for the baby
customer_reviews.text: Firm and so far is working great for the baby. Not had it long enough to see how it stands up to use and toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Nicole N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mattress, but a little more firm than I was expecting. Comfortable for my daughter and supports her well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hoffart

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a mattress I used on the dog bed I made, very happy with the fit, dogs don't like it. . .
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and firm
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and firm. It's not too hard. Fits just right in the crib and the baby seems to sleep just fine. We've had it for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Kutter B

customer_reviews.title: Newest Granddaughter Sleeping Peacefully
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was my daughter's request because she had a Sealy mattress for her other two children. The comfort and durability are excellent. My daughter and new granddaughter are both sleeping peacefully. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: LMorris

customer_reviews.title: Decent mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is firm, shipped reasonably quickly. Box was a little beaten up, UPS almost didn't leave it, multiple ship to addresses and packing slips left excessive ambiguity as to where the final destination was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems good and firm. The baby is not yet here so he's not sleeping on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jump

customer_reviews.title: Noisy mattress
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it's possible but this mattress makes so much noise my child cannot sleep on it. The springs creak with every move he makes. It's hard and uncomfortable. Poor guy is miserable. I am going to try and return this!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described! Excited for our little guy to get here!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Womacks

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter now sleeps through the night on this mattress, where she was waking every few hours before.
customer_reviews.author: Unikiam

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit Ikea Sunvik
customer_reviews.text: I swear I read a review before I bought this that it would fit the Ikea Sundvik crib. It does not. It's definitely too short. Other than that it's okay. It does seem a bit too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They loved it so I guess it was money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. They loved it so I guess it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: suki hollenday

customer_reviews.title: which is pretty disappointing. Other than that mattress is okay
customer_reviews.text: My LO is seven weeks old and has only recently started sleeping in her crib through the night; before, she would just nap in it. Already, there is an indentation where her head has been resting, which is pretty disappointing. Other than that mattress is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sealy Baby Perfect Rest Waterproof Standard Toddler & Baby Crib Mattress - 150 Extra Firm Coils, 51.7” x 27.3"
product_meta.description: The Sealy Perfect Rest Infant and Toddler Crib Mattress has a high coil count 150 heavy-gauge steel innerspring coil system and secure edges. Reinforced cover with lock-stitched waterproof binding resists stains, odors and moisture. Entire mattress wipes clean with a damp cloth for a sanitary sleeping surface. Firm hypoallergenic layers provide a hypoallergenic sleeping layer for comfort and support. Designed, engineered and proudly made in the USA of U.S. and globally sourced parts. Lifetime warranty on workmanship and materials. More babies sleep on a Sealy than any other crib mattress brand in the USA. Sealy proudly supports infants and toddlers with industry-leading crib mattresses known for safety, quality, comfort and premium support.
feature_bullets: 150 COIL COUNT -- Engineered with 150 extra firm heat-tempered interlocking steel coils for long-lasting support and secure-edge heavy gauge steel border rods, providing maximum support around the sides of baby’s mattress

WATERPROOF SURFACE & COMFORTABLE LAYERS -- Reinforced cover with lock-stitched waterproof binding resists stains, odors and moisture. Firm hypoallergenic layers provide a hypoallergenic sleeping layer for comfort and support
SAFETY & QUALITY TESTED -- This entire crib mattress is GREENGUARD Gold certified for indoor air quality and tested for chemicals to help create a healthier sleeping environment for your baby
MADE IN THE USA -- Sealy Crib and Toddler Mattresses are designed, engineered and proudly made in the USA of U.S. and imported parts. Lifetime warranty on workmanship and materials
PERFECT FIT -- Measures 51.7” x 27.3" and fits both USA standard size cribs and toddler beds. Beds, Bed frames and Foundations sold separately

AWARD WINNING BRAND -- More babies sleep on a Sealy than any other crib mattress brand in the USA. As the manufacturer, we stand behind all our products with great customer service and support. If there is anything we can do to help you, please let us know

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
